meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Paul Cheng Ellen Dickens Ted Sitting Crow Garner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6118.

td.p: Paul Cheng, a graduate student of English from Walnut, California
Ellen Dickens, an adult education director from Newcastle, Maine
Ted Sitting Crow Garner, a sculptor and writer from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $2,500)

tr.td: A DICKENSIAN NIGHTMARE
(Alex: You have to name the novel that would've inspired our clue.)
UNIVERSITY SPORTS TEAMS
"GENERAL" JOB INFORMATION
BATTLE TO NAME THE WAR
MAGAZINE FEATURES
3-LETTER ABBREV.

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
